column2: 1. When reporting research methods, do the Journal Instructions require authors to:
column6: 2. When reporting statistical methods, do the Journal Instructions require authors to:
column10: 3. When reporting results in text, do the Journal Instructions require authors to:
column19: 4. When plotting results in figures, do the Journal Instructions require authors to:
column21: 5. To encourage transparent reporting, do the Journal Instructions require authors to:

column1: R: Required,   E: Encouraged,   N: No mention
column2: Report whether the study protocol was pre-registered, for clinical trials?
column3: Report whether the study protocol was pre-registered or registered, for all other study designs?
column6: Report, for frequentist analysis, the alpha threshold (e.g. 0.05) that defines statistical significance?
column7: Report criteria used to exclude data?
column8: Report how any missing data were treated in the analyses?
column9: Report, for Bayesian analysis, the prior probabilities?
column10: Define all written measures that describe data variability?
column11: Describe data using mean and SD, where appropriate?
column12: Describe data using median and IQR, range, or both, where appropriate?
column13: NOT use the SE or CI (e.g. 95% CI) to describe data?
column14: Report the P value for all tests of statistical significance?
column15: Report exact P values (e.g. p = 0.021 or p < 0.001)?
column16: Report a measure of precision (e.g. 95% CI) for effect sizes?
column17: NOT interpret P values above the alpha threshold as trends towards statistical significance or as statistically significant?
column18: Report, for Bayesian analysis, the posterior distribution with a measure of central tendency and a credibility interval?
column19: Define all plotted measures that summarise data variability or estimates of effect size?
column20: Plot the individual participant/ specimen data in all figures that summarise data variability or estimates of effect size?
column21: Make (de-identified) data used in the statistical analysis publicly available?
column22: Make data processing code or spreadsheets publicly available?
column23: Make statistical analysis code or spreadsheets publicly available?
